message.content:
1. There was a control condition in the study.
2. There were two health-warning conditions in the study.
3. The beverage was consumed in the study.
4. The beverage was consumed at a slower rate in the two health-warning conditions compared to the control condition.
5. The two health-warning conditions did not differ from each other in terms of the rate of beverage consumption. 
6. The slower rate of beverage consumption in the health-warning conditions was surprising.

messages.content:
Statement: We found that compared with the control condition, the beverage was consumed at a slower rate in the two health-warning conditions, which surprisingly did not differ from each other.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
